item.title: 2 Wrong Way to Learn Copy Assignment Operator in C++ With Example
item.description: While I was introducing myself to C++, I was confused about the syntax of the copy assignment operator in C++ & some of its use-cases. I have learned those lessons the hard way. And so I have decided to write this article, where we see 2 wrong way to learn copy assignment operator in C++ with example. And we also see why we need it & why its syntax like that only.
